_description: A proverbial couplet, translating ‘In nivis algore cantat omnia dolore…

BodDou52.Transcription: All hit is for woþat þe hen syngs in snowe
BodDou52.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Die Mittelenglische Sprichwörtersammlung in Douce 52.” 
             Festschrift zum XII Deutschen Neuphilolgentage in München
                1906.
            E. Stollreither, ed. 
         Erlangen (1906): 40-64: 47.

RylandsLat394.Transcription:
Alle it is for wooþat þe herr synges in þe
                    snowe
RylandsLat394.Note: All written on one line of MS.
RylandsLat394.Editions:
Pantin,  William A. 
             “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands
                Latin MS. 394.” 
             Bulletin of the John Rylands Library
         14 (1930): 81-114: 97.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 560.
